Ebbro P-4 P417 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R34) 1999 JGTC Series GT500 Class Test Car

Purchased: 2014

1999 was the first season for the new R34 version of the Skyline GT-R. It was also the last version of the Skyline GT-R, replaced by the Fairlady Z in 2004. R34s took the Super GT GT500 class title 2 times - it's first (1999) & last (2003) seasons.
